description: Content of parts of 'guide' and 'travel_advice' documents

schema.name: url
schema.description: URL of a piece of static content on the www.gov.uk domain

schema.name: base_path
schema.description: URL of the parent document of the part

schema.name: part_index
schema.description: The order of the part among other parts in the same document, counting from 0

schema.name: html
schema.description: The content of the page as HTML

schema.name: text
schema.description: The content of the page as plain text extracted from the HTML

schema.name: text_without_blank_lines
schema.description: The content of the page as plain text, omitting blank lines
